GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
mtd: rawnand: intel: fix possible null-ptr-deref in ebu_nand_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit daa5166450b447415aeeaac0199e445bae7bd0f2, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 0b1039f016e8a37c779a4aee362cb2100ebb1cfd. For more details please see the references link.
